verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to live <S%H3427>in<s%>; and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> also unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> for the <S%H5892>cities<s%> round about <S%H5439>them<s%>.

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall they have to live <S%H3427>in<s%>; and the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of them shall be for their <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and for their <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and for all their <S%H2416>animals<s%>.

And the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, shall reach from the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H2351>outward<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And you shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> from <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>middle<s%>: this shall be to them the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And among the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> there shall be <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, which you shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%>, that he may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H5414>there<s%>: and to them you shall add <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

So all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>: them shall you give with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> shall be of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: from them that have <S%H7227>many<s%> you shall give <S%H7235>many<s%>; but from them that have <S%H4592>few<s%> you shall give <S%H4591>few<s%>: every <S%H376>one<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> of his <S%H5892>cities<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> which he <S%H5157>inherits<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H5674>them<s%>, When you be come over <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>;

Then you shall <S%H7136>appoint<s%> you <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for <S%H7523>you<s%>; that the slayer may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H5221>there<s%>, which kills any <S%H5315>person<s%> at <S%H7684>unawares<s%>.

And they shall be unto you <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H4733>refuge<s%> from the <S%H1350>avenger<s%>; that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5975>not<s%>, until he stand <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
And of these <S%H5892>cities<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall you have for <S%H4733>refuge<s%>.

You shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall you <S%H5414>give<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which shall be <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%>.

These <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be a <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, both for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, and for the <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5221>them<s%>: that every one that kills any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unawares<s%> may flee <S%H5127>there<s%>.

And if he <S%H5221>strike<s%> him with an <S%H3627>instrument<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, so that he <S%H4191>die<s%>, he is a <S%H7523>murderer<s%>: the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And if he <S%H5221>strike<s%> him with <S%H3027>throwing<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%>, with which he may <S%H4191>die<s%>, and he <S%H4191>die<s%>, he is a <S%H7523>murderer<s%>: the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

Or if he <S%H5221>strike<s%> him with an <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%>, with which he may <S%H4191>die<s%>, and he <S%H4191>die<s%>, he is a <S%H7523>murderer<s%>: the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
The <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> himself shall <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%>: when he <S%H6293>meets<s%> <S%H1931>him<s%>, he shall kill <S%H4191>him<s%>.
But if he <S%H1920>thrust<s%> him of <S%H8135>hatred<s%>, or <S%H7993>hurl<s%> at him by laying of <S%H6660>wait<s%>, that he <S%H4191>die<s%>;

Or in <S%H342>enmity<s%> <S%H5221>strike<s%> him with his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that he <S%H4191>die<s%>: he that <S%H5221>struck<s%> him shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; for he is a <S%H7523>murderer<s%>: the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%>, when he meets <S%H6293>him<s%>.
But if he <S%H1920>thrust<s%> him <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> <S%H3808>outside<s%> <S%H342>enmity<s%>, or have <S%H7993>cast<s%> upon him any <S%H3627>thing<s%> outside laying of <S%H6660>wait<s%>,

Or with any <S%H68>stone<s%>, with which a man may <S%H4191>die<s%>, <S%H7200>seeing<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%>, and <S%H5307>cast<s%> it upon <S%H4191>him<s%>, that he die, and was not his <S%H341>enemy<s%>, neither <S%H1245>sought<s%> his <S%H7451>harm<s%>:
Then the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> between the <S%H5221>slayer<s%> and the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> according to these <S%H4941>judgments<s%>:

And the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> him to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, where he was <S%H5127>fled<s%>: and he shall <S%H3427>stay<s%> in it unto the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, which was <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
But if the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> shall at any <S%H3318>time<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> outside the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, where he was <S%H5127>fled<s%>;

And the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, and the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7523>kill<s%> the <S%H7523>slayer<s%>; he shall not be guilty of <S%H1818>blood<s%>:

Because he should have <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge<s%> until the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>: but <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H272>possession<s%>.
So these things shall be for a <S%H2708>statute<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> unto you throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.

Whoever <S%H5221>kills<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%>, the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall be put to <S%H7523>death<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>: but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not <S%H6030>testify<s%> against any <S%H5315>person<s%> to cause him to <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Moreover you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> no <S%H3724>satisfaction<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of a <S%H7523>murderer<s%>, which is <S%H7563>guilty<s%> of <S%H4191>death<s%>: but he shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> no <S%H3724>satisfaction<s%> for him that is <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, that he should come <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, until the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

So you shall not <S%H2610>pollute<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H1818>are<s%>: for blood it <S%H2610>defiles<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: and the <S%H776>land<s%> cannot be <S%H3722>cleansed<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is <S%H8210>shed<s%> in <S%H1818>it<s%>, but by the blood of him that shed <S%H8210>it<s%>.

<S%H2930>Defile<s%> not therefore the <S%H776>land<s%> which you shall <S%H3427>inhabit<s%>, <S%H8432>where<s%> I <S%H7931>live<s%>: for I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7931>live<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
